# Getting in touch

```{toctree}
Ask a question <https://github.com/computational-psychology/stimupy/issues/new/choose>
Report a bug <https://github.com/computational-psychology/stimupy/issues/new?assignees=&labels=bug&template=bug_report.md>
Propose an edit to the documentation <https://github.com/computational-psychology/stimupy/issues/new?assignees=&labels=documentation&template=documentation-change.md>
Suggest a stimulus function <https://github.com/computational-psychology/stimupy/issues/new?assignees=&labels=enhancement&template=stimulus-request.md&title=Add+%3CSTIMULUS%3E>
Suggest a set of stimuli <https://github.com/computational-psychology/stimupy/issues/new?assignees=&labels=enhancement&template=stimulus-set-request.md&title=Add+set+%3CCITATION%3E>
```
